---
title: "Introgression analyses"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r setup}

library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(ggthemes)
library(colorspace)

```

```{r}

totab <- tibble()

for (i in c(1, 3, 5)) {
  for (j in 1:5) {
    totab <- read_csv(
      glue('../results/sim_1_{i}_{j}_introgression_error_model.csv'),
      show_col_types = FALSE, col_names = FALSE
      ) |> 
      mutate(
        n_int_ABC = i,
        rep = j
      ) |> 
      bind_rows(totab)
  }
}

```


```{r}

totab |> 
  group_by(X3 < X7) |> 
  summarise(
    n = is.na(X12) |> sum()
  )

```

```{r}

totab |> 
  mutate(
    first = X3 > X7,
    second = X4 > (X5+X7)
  ) |> 
  group_by(first, second) |> 
  summarise(
    n = is.na(X12) |> sum()
  )

```
